forum.content:
嗨，礙於工作環境的關係；異性友人有點少，想多多認識新朋友；照慣例，我28，178/75，不菸不酒，偶爾運動，一週三天吧；興趣是看電影，會一點點攝影，我偏愛定焦鏡；希望能有個聊天的對象囉；講白一點當然是希望能找個穩定的伴，歡迎加我聊天呢！

Hi, reader, I wanna make a friend with you. 'Cause of my job, is hard to make different gender friends in my daily life. I'm 28 year-old, 178/75 cm/kg, no smoking and drinking, doing some exercise three times a week. I like watching movies and photographing sometimes, I wish I could find one can talk and chat with me. So, just add and talk to me!
forum.title: 交個朋友吧～
